episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Walter White, a chemistry teacher, discovers he has terminal lung cancer and partners with a former student to make money selling methamphetamine.

episodes.name: Cat's in the Bag
episodes.overview: Walter and Jesse try to tie up loose ends.

episodes.name: ...And the Bag's in the River
episodes.overview: Walter fights with his guilty conscience.

episodes.name: Cancer Man
episodes.overview: Walter tells his family about his cancer diagnosis.

episodes.name: Gray Matter
episodes.overview: Walter's former business partners offer to pay for his cancer treatment.

episodes.name: Crazy Handful of Nothin'
episodes.overview: Walter moves up to the next level.

episodes.name: A No-Rough-Stuff-Type Deal
episodes.overview: Walter and Jesse make plans to produce more meth.
